text: Yves Martin (22 November 1929 – 23 February 2021) was a Canadian sociologist. He was the rector at the Université de Sherbrooke and was one of the founders of the Institut de recherche Robert-Sauvé en santé et en sécurité du travail. Martin died on 23 February 2021 at the age of 91. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Canadian academics Category:Sociologists Category:Writers from Quebec
title: Yves Martin
